Media.MediaTitle: Childhood Soft Tissue Sarcoma - Spunt Figure

ImageData.LabelName: Unresected (unresectable or high-grade tumor >5 cm where delayed resection planned)
Metastatic to lymph nodes or distant sites, or both
Assess resection status of primary tumor

OriginalSource.Creator: The Lancet Oncology
OriginalSource.SourcePublication: Spunt SL, Million L, Chi Y, et al., A risk-based treatment strategy for non-rhabdomyosarcoma soft-tissue sarcomas in patients younger than 30 years (ARST0332): a Children's Oncology Group prospective study. ContentDescriptions.ContentDescription: Diagram showing risk group and treatment assignment for the Children’s Oncology Group ARST0332 trial.

Insertion.ContentDescription: Diagrama en el que se muestra el grupo de riesgo y la asignación al tratamiento para el ensayo ARST0332 del Children’s Oncology Group.

Captions.MediaCaption: Risk group and treatment assignment for the Children’s Oncology Group ARST0332 trial. Reprinted from The Lancet Oncology, Volume 21 (Issue 1), Spunt SL, Million L, Chi YY, et al., A risk-based treatment strategy for non-rhabdomyosarcoma soft-tissue sarcomas in patients younger than 30 years (ARST0332): a Children's Oncology Group prospective study. Pages 145–161, Copyright © 2020, with permission from Elsevier.

Insertion.MediaCaption: Grupo de riesgo y asignación al tratamiento Risk group and treatment assignment para el ensayo ARST0332 del Children’s Oncology Group. Reproducción de The Lancet Oncology, Volume 21 (Issue 1), Spunt SL, Million L, Chi YY, et al., A risk-based treatment strategy for non-rhabdomyosarcoma soft-tissue sarcomas in patients younger than 30 years (ARST0332): a Children's Oncology Group prospective study. Páginas 145–161, Derechos de autor © 2020, autorizada por Elsevier. Diagnosis of eligible soft-tissue sarcoma: diagnóstico de pacientes con sarcoma de tejido blando aptos; Non-metastatic: no metastásico; Grossly resected: resección macroscópica; Unresected (unresectable or high-grade tumor >5 cm where delayed resection planned): sin resecar (no irresecable o tumor de grado alto que mide >5 cm donde se planifica una resección diferida); Tumour grade: grado del tumor; Low: bajo; High: alto; Microscopic margins negative or positive: márgenes microscópicos negativos o positivos; Maximal tumour diameter: diámetro máximo del tumor; Microscopic margins negative: márgenes microscópicos negativos; Microscopic margins positive: márgenes microscópicos positivos; Surgery alone: cirugía sola; Radiotherapy: radioterapia; Chemoradio-therapy: quimiorradioterapia; Neoadjuvant chemoradio-therapy: quimiorradioterapia neoadyuvante; Low risk: riesgo bajo; Intermediate risk: riesgo intermedio; Metastatic to lymph nodes or distant sites, or both: metástasis a los ganglios linfáticosganglionares o a sitios distantes, o ambos; All disease resected?: ¿se ha resecóado toda la enfermedad?; Yes: sí; Assess resection status of primary tumor: evaluar el estado de la resección del tumor primario; Unresected: sin resecar; High risk: riesgo alto.
